Text: Thank's, very good man. If you upload requests I'd like to have Atomic Mail Sender, one of the latest vers, thank's for a nice job

arulkarthik, what program would i need to use if i wanted to cut a picture on my computer into 8 squares & keep all 8 saved on my computer? im useless at photo editing so any info you can tell me will help. i noticed you had some photo programs, would any of these do my job?
Sorry to ask, but how would this work on a computer without any voices installed? I'd love to use this portable app on my office computer, but that is locked to new installations.

Works great, thanks!

You have to run it though in Admin mode or else Open File won't work.

Also, the program occasionally opens a registration web page, noting that the serial is not legit. If you're paranoid about this, simply add the line "0.0.0.0 www.nextup.com" to your hosts file.
@Thrace, only if the default Microsoft speech synthesizer is pre-installed on the machine.
